name: foxy-proxy
description: Unified proxy and DuoPlus management system with feature flags and enhanced templates

scripts.clean: cd packages/dashboard && rm -rf dist node_modules .nyc_output coverage
scripts.setup: bun install && cd packages/dashboard && bun install
scripts.deploy: cd packages/dashboard && bun build && bun run deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: bun run build:staging && bun run deploy:staging
scripts.deploy:prod: bun run build:prod && bun run deploy:prod
scripts.cashapp:demo: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts demo
scripts.cashapp:provision: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts provision
scripts.cashapp:monitor: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts monitor
scripts.cashapp:report: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts report
scripts.cashapp:names: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts names
scripts.cashapp:addresses: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/cashapp-cli.ts addresses
scripts.profile:create: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/unified-cli.ts create
scripts.profile:list: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/unified-cli.ts list
scripts.profile:export: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/unified-cli.ts export
scripts.profile:import: cd packages/dashboard && bun run src/utils/scaling/unified-cli.ts import
